verses.name: Psalms 40:12
verses.text: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.

verses.name: Psalms 40:13
verses.text: Be pleased, O Lord, to deliver me: O Lord, make haste to help me.

verses.name: Psalms 40:14
verses.text: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil.

verses.name: Psalms 40:15
verses.text: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me, Aha, aha.
